column4: Is there a way to put music onto my iPod in Linux that won't mess anything up when I go put things on with iTunes on my WinXP box
iTunes windows detects differences in the checksum since you last docked, and FREAKS

Define FREAKS. I've uploaded stuff from two different computers before(Albeit, both WinXP with iTunes), and it always worked fine when I go to the other computer, with the exception of when I sync games
